title: Post-glacial ecosystems could help slow down climate change: Study
description: Global study shows glacier retreat creates new ecosystems that could help mitigate climate change, emphasizing importance of proper management

title: Opinion The UN's summit this month is a cause for hope in the battle against climate change
description: Hans Zomer looks ahead to the next environmental summit and hopes things can change for the better.

title: Tunisia fisherwomen battle inequality and climate change
description: Off a quiet Tunisian island, Sara Souissi readies her small fishing boat. As a woman in the male-dominated trade, she rows against entrenched patriarchy but also climate change.

title: Partnerships seen as key to combat climate woes
The Heat: Global Climate Crisis
description: A recent World Meteorological Organization report revealed that in 2023, the Southwest Pacific region experienced 34 reported extreme weather events that caused significant damage.

title: Govt to develop Mausam GPT in 5 years to share weather information
description: India News: NEW DELHI: Indian weather scientists hope to have enough expertise in the next five years to not only enhance rain but also suppress it.

title: Climate change now a top worry for Canadian CEOs: survey
description: The proportion of Canadian business leaders who say they are worried about climate change jumped dramatically in 2024.

title: Climate Change Drives Surge In 'Coolcation' Travel Trends - What You Need To Know
description: As global warming intensifies, the new travel trend 'coolcation' emerges, reflecting a shift towards cooler destinations.

title: Rs 2,000 crore plan for weather forecast system gets Cabinet approval
description: India News: NEW DELHI: Cabinet on Wednesday approved 'Mission Mausam' with an outlay of Rs 2,000 crore over two years to create a more robust forecasting system.

title: Climate Authority: Brazil’s New Weapon Against Climate Change
description: President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva's announcement of a Climate Authority marks a significant shift in Brazil's environmental policy.

title: The presidential debate proved that climate change is not at center of 2024 election, experts say
description: Climate change continues to remain on the backburner of the 2024 election following little mention of environmental policy during the first debate.

title: Union Cabinet approves 'Mission Mausam' to provide highly accurate and timely weather information
description: The Union Cabinet has approved a programme called 'Mission Mausam' to create accurate weather predictions.

title: Churchill adapts and thrives as warming climate threatens polar bear tourism
description: Residents, government officials, and experts say Churchill is a model for coping with climate change's impact on polar bear tourism.

title: Weather aids B.C. fire fight amid evacuation order in southeast
description: Cooler, wetter weather is dampening fire behavior across B.C., but a new blaze in East Kootenay prompted an evacuation order.

title: China and U.S. push forward climate actions
